MAIN.TITLE: FreeNG UI framework
MAIN.INTRODUCTION:
FreeNG is a UI framework based on Angular, provides a lot of powerful re-combination of UI components. The threshold is very low, used to use.

FreeNG is still very young, the first version was released in May 2017.
MAIN.DECLARATION: Special statement: Free name Free, FreeNG is completely open source free!

FEATURE.TITLE: Feature
FEATURE.INTRO:
1. Based on the latest Angular4
  2. Take the Flex layout to achieve a fully responsive layout
  3. Rich theme selection
  4. Easy-to-use API, UI components that can be combined on demand

START.KNOW: Here assume that you already have HTML, CSS and JavaScript intermediate front-end knowledge and have enough understanding of the Angular framework. If you are just starting to learn front or Angular, it might not be a good idea to use the component as a first step, and recommend learning Angular and TypeScript first.
START.IMPORT: Import from freeng module (use this way to import all modules into):
START.COMPONENT: Import a single component module (with label):
START.DIRECTIVE: Import a single directive module (with label):
START.ANIMATION: In Angular 4+, the animation module has been separated into separate modules, so it needs to be installed and imported.

GRID.DESCRIPTION:
Grid System Based on Flex Layout.

  • The response modifier can specify different column sizes, offsets, alignments, and distributions on the four viewport widths of xs, sm, md, and lg.
  • Create a set of 'columns' in the horizontal direction by 'row'
GRID.NAME: Parameter
OPTION: Small screen <small> phone </ small>
small screen <small> tablet </ small>
screen <small> desktop display </ small>
big screen <small> large desktop display </ Small>
GRID.USE: All you need to remember is the row, column, content.

TYPOGRAPHY.DESCRIPTION: A good layout layout determines the beauty of the page.
TYPOGRAPHY.TITLE: Headings

SHAPE.DESCRIPTION: By adding the following corresponding classes for the <img> element, you can make the picture look different.

SHADOW.DESCRIPTION: Use the shadow can produce three-dimensional sense.

COLUMN.DESCRIPTION: The CSS3 multi-column layout allows easy definition of multiple columns of text - just like in newspapers
OPTION: Set the number of container columns/column width/column between the rules/column spacing/across the number of columns and so on. Defaults to two columns.
If you do not understand columns, you can get here

BUTTON.DESCRIPTION:
A button is an important element of interaction with an application that can be made up of text or icons and can be enhanced by various attributes.

  • Icon button
  • Round button
  • Button group
BUTTON.BUTTONDESC: required, Used to define a button
BUTTON.SIZE: Optional, used to set the size of the button (big, middle (default), small, mini)
BUTTON.THEME: Set the default style, optional. Optional (primary / info / success / warning / danger)
BUTTON.DISABLED: Optional, disable the button and block his actions. The default is false
BUTTON.ICON: Optional, used to set the icon.Fontawesome
BUTTON.BLOCK: Optional, displayed as a block element

LIST.DESCRIPTION:
The list is used to display information lines, such as contact lists, playlists, or menus.

  • Multimedia list
LIST.HOVER: Optional, whether to add a touch effect
LIST.AVATAR: A container for media elements (such as icons, pictures, etc.)

CARD.DESCRIPTION: This is a simple card with plain text. But the card can contain its own page header, footer, list view, image, and any element inside it.
CARD.CARD-HEADER: The card header is mainly used to display the card title. Optional
CARD.CARD-CONTENT: The main contents of the card contents
CARD.CARD-FOOTER: The card footer is used for some additional information or custom actions / links. Optional

PANEL.DESCRIPTION: A panel is often used as a container for other components.
OPTION: whether to show the tool.

INPUTTEXT.DESCRIPTION: The input box allows the user to enter text, usually in the form of a form.
OPTION: Set the default style, optional. Optional (success / warning / error)
Set the prompt message, optional

Set the regular match information, optional.
optional values：
  • tel:phone number
  • email:email
  • card:identification number
  • chinese:Chinese
Note: If the value is not in the built-in authentication, the value is used as the authentication information
Set the authentication message when the authentication fails, select
Whether to add an icon, optional (using FontAwesome)
The input type, including all Input supported types (text / password, etc.), defaults is text
Whether to disable, the default is false
VALIDATION: Must be 15 or 18 ID card number!
Please enter at least one Chinese

Whether inline display, optional, default is false

in order to make the chart control effect, must be introduced into the chart.js, there are two ways:

through the chain through the chain chart.js

DATATABLE.DESCRIPTION:
The data table can be used to display the data list.

  • paging, fixed headers and sorting
  • provided Rich support, checkbox
INTRO: Must be similar to the HTML table, a free-datatable corresponds to a table.
Required, similar to HTML td, that a column of data.

Whether to display the border, the default is false
Whether to show the zebra crossing, the default is false
Whether to add hover effect, the default is false
Whether to add a check box or a radio button, select an optional value (single / multiple)
Whether to display the pager, optional, default is false
The number of data per page, optional, the default is 10
Whether to show the contents of the foldable, the default is false. Need to combine ng-template, you can refer to the example on the right.
Whether the fixed head, the default is false.
The name of the column must be, corresponding to the free-datatable value in the data key
Column description of the name, must be selected
Whether the current column can be sorted, the default is false
EVENTS: When choosing a callback function that triggers a change.

MODAL.DESCRIPTION: The modal box contains text and UI controls that are specific to a particular task, informing the user of critical information, requiring the user to make a decision or involve multiple tasks
OPTION: Modal box title.

Click the mask layer to turn off the modal box, optional.

NOTIFICATION.DESCRIPTION: Simple page message notification component. You can set the message to appear in the four corners of the page. You can close the message manually or set it to auto off.

Message notification box delay off time. The default is 3000ms.
The location of the message notification box. The default is TopRight . (Optional values: topLeft, topRight, bottomLeft, bottomRight)

The number of data displayed per page, optional, defaults to 10
The current page number, optional.

The linear progress bar fills 0% to 100% to show the progress of the task. It also shows that there is a task waiting to be completed.

CHANGE.DROPDOWN:
1) add custom content

2) add hover events
CHANGE.MODAL:
1) add loading modal

2) Add a delay mask modal

v012.FIX:
• Fix the form validation still exists when entering another page
  • Fix the pager click no effect
  • The table component removes the selection box / sort / pagination three functions , Please use datatable for previous features.
v012.UPDATE:
• Inputtext new component validation
  • upload the component
    • Optimize picture preview style
    • The free-file tag is renamed to free-upload
  • The chipsChange event of the Chip component is modified to onChange
  • List avatar new component circle attribute
  • Tab (Tab) Added component disabled attribute and onChange event
  • The data binding of the checkbox has been modified. See example.

v013.BUG: Fix the component (Accordion, Colorpicker, Calendar) style

v020.FEATURE:
• Added ratings for new stars
  • Timeline new custom title
  • Breadcrumb new Two custom types
  • Range add the handleSize property to set the slider size
  • Tree menu (Tree) Add checkbox and click event
  • Add topic properties
v020.BUG:
• Fix the scope of the date selector problem when select
  • Repair the rich text editor table selection box height disorder
  • Fix the star rating (Rating) can not restore the original value of the problem
  • adjust the input box (Inputtext) verify the location of the prompt

v021.BUG:
• Fixes need to manually install highlight.js dependencies
  • Fixes need to manually install chart.js dependency issues

v022.ADD:
• ADD the share button.
  • Calendar add timeOnly property to show only time selection
  • Sidenav
    • add outside / navStyle / overlayBackground properties
    • direction property new top / bottom
    • Add flattening mode, the content follows the menu translation
  • Modal add draggable.
v022.BUG:
• Fix the problem which the f-header component could not be found
  • Export the FlowModule module globally#3
  • Fix the problem which the button have to double-click to open Sidenav when you click the translucent background to close Sidenav.#3

v023.BUG: • fix the bug which TreeComponent could not be select

v024.BUG: • Fix the dependent module version conflict issues

v025.FEATURE:
• Modal add onChange event.
  • Slide
    • add touch property，used to control whether to turn on touch events
    • add direction property
    • Optimize Slide style
v025.BUG: • fix Datatable bug when select all item.

v030.BUG: • Fix Spinner Set the maximum and minimum values that can not be clicked
v030.FEATURE:
• Add Knob component
  • Add the Steps component
  • Optimize the Modal style
  • Panel
    • Optimize the style of the Panel
    • Add the tool property for the tool
  • Optimize the style of the Range
  • Optimize the style of Calendar
  • Optimize the style of the Button
  • Progress Add the barColor and trackColor properties
  • Turn off the Accordion switch animation

v031.FEATURE:
• Optimized the style of the Panel
  • Optimized the style of the Datatable
  • Optimized the style of the Panel

v032.FEATURE:
• Add Popover component
  • Optimize List style

  • Inputtext add type attribute

  • Optimize Progress style

v040.BUG:
• Fix the Cropper's cropping frame to the border, the image is in a messy position.#4
  • Fix Modal off when the mask is not closed.
v040.FEATURE:
• Add Scroll Component
  • Editor Added onUploadCompleted property to trigger when image upload is successful.
  • Modal adds the dismissMask property to control whether the click mask can close the modal box.

v041.BUG:
• Fix dropdown menu Dropdown problems that still persist after shutdown
  • Fix white background issues when selecting Switch type 2
  • Fix Scroll components Can not scroll under Firefox
  • Fix Progress can not set dynamic value.
v041.FEATURE:
• Added styleClass property to Accordion for custom styling
  • Added common form validators (date, email, url, cn, range, number, phone)
  • Upload
    • Added maxFileSize attribute
    • Added method, url, withCredentials attribute
    • Added showProgress attribute
    • Added invalidFileSizeMessage, invalidFileTypeMessage attribute
    • Added styleClass

MESSAGE: Very pleased to inform you, after four months of close development, FreeNG @ 0.2.0 finally released. This version I refactored the underlying code, continue to update the new component features and improve the optimization of existing components And provide a complete use of the document. Welcome to continue to focus and spur. In the use of any problems encountered, please give me feedback.
